metadata.title: CVE-2021-46924 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFC:st21nfca: Fix memory leak in device probe and remove 'phy->pending_skb' isalloced when device probe, but forgot to free in the error handling pathand remove path, this cause memory leak as follows: unreferenced object0xffff88800bc06800 (size 512): comm "8", pid 11775, jiffies 4295159829 (age9.032s) hex dump (first 32 bytes): 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 0000 00 00 ................ 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00................ backtrace: [<00000000d66c09ce>]__kmalloc_node_track_caller+0x1ed/0x450 [<00000000c93382b3>]kmalloc_reserve+0x37/0xd0 [<000000005fea522c>] __alloc_skb+0x124/0x380[<0000000019f29f9a>] st21nfca_hci_i2c_probe+0x170/0x8f2 Fix it by freeing'pending_skb' in error and remove.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46924` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-173-generic - 4.15.0-173.182
linux-image-4.15.0-173-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-173.182
linux-image-4.15.0-173-lowlatency - 4.15.0-173.182
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-173-generic - 4.15.0-173.182
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-173-lowlatency - 4.15.0-173.182
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-105-generic - 5.4.0-105.119~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-105-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-105.119~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-105-lowlatency - 5.4.0-105.119~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-105-generic - 5.4.0-105.119~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-105-lowlatency - 5.4.0-105.119~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1110-kvm - 4.15.0-1110.113
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1124-aws - 4.15.0-1124.133
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1069-aws - 5.4.0-1069.73~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1134-azure - 4.15.0-1134.147
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1073-azure - 5.4.0-1073.76~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1119-gcp - 4.15.0-1119.133
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1018-ibm - 5.4.0-1018.20~18.04.1
No subscription required

No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-173.182').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-105.119~18.04.1').
